info.title: YellowAPI™ Places API
info.description:
Test our API services using I/O Docs. YellowAPI™ Places API provides a easy to use interface to find Canadian businesses with a keyword (name or category) and location (geocode, landmark or city/province). Results include address, web URLs, videos, thumbnails, hours of operation, and much more. Some attributes for a business are not immediately available, and must be requested via developer@yellowapi.com.

The io-docs defined below are for our Sandbox API key for use in development.

See the full documentation here at [http://www.yellowapi.com/docs/places/].

externalDocs.description: You can also view our written documentation.

get.summary: Find business with a keyword / location

parameters.name: what
parameters.description: Keyword search term. This may be keywords, business names, or category

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: Location search term. This may be a city, province, landmark, postal code or geocode specified in format cZ<longitude>,<latitude>. If a location is not specified, the requester's IP address will be used to populate this field.

parameters.name: pgLen
parameters.description: Number of results to return in each page. Default value is 40.

parameters.name: pg
parameters.description: Which page of the result set to return.

parameters.name: sflag
parameters.description:
Flags to modify or filter the search result. These may be combined as logical "AND" filters.

To combine more than one filter, use the "dash" to separate each value. Eg. bn (business name), fto (with photos), vdo (with video)

parameters.name: dist
parameters.description: Positive integer representing radius in kilometer

parameters.name: fmt
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Set the language for the response. Permitted values are en or fr

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: A string of characters which uniquely identifies a user of the application (such as their IP address, session ID, or phone ID)

get.summary: Returns a list of all dealers/franchises/branches ...
get.description: Returns a list of all dealers/franchises/branches for that business. A business with several locations may have a "parent" listing (primary) and one or more "children" listings.

parameters.name: pid
parameters.description: The parent listing ID

parameters.name: pgLen
parameters.description: Number of results to return in each page. Default value is 40.

parameters.name: pg
parameters.description: Which page of the result set to return.

parameters.name: fmt
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Set the language for the response. Permitted values are en or fr

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: A string of characters which uniquely identifies a user of the application (such as their IP address, session ID, or phone ID)

get.summary: Find sponsored business with a keyword / location....
get.description: Find sponsored business with a keyword / location. This call should only be used under guidance of the YellowAPI™ team for monetization purposes.

parameters.name: what
parameters.description: Keyword search term. This may be keywords, business names, or category

parameters.name: where
parameters.description: Location search term. This may be a city, province, landmark, postal code or geocode specified in format cZ<longitude>,<latitude>. If a location is not specified, the requester's IP address will be used to populate this field.

parameters.name: pgLen
parameters.description: Number of results to return in each page. Default value is 40.

parameters.name: pg
parameters.description: Which page of the result set to return.

parameters.name: fmt
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Set the language for the response. Permitted values are en or fr

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: A string of characters which uniquely identifies a user of the application (such as their IP address, session ID, or phone ID)

get.summary: Get business details given a listing ID. This call...
get.description: Get business details given a listing ID. This call is usually made after a FindBusiness or FindDealer call.

parameters.name: listingId
parameters.description: Listing ID to see details

parameters.name: bus-name
parameters.description: Business name of the listing. This name must be SEO-normalized: accents removed, non-alphanumeric characters (including spaces) replaced with dashes, and multiple dashes replaced to single.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City for the listing. This name must be SEO-normalized: accents removed, non-alphanumeric characters (including spaces) replaced with dashes, and multiple dashes replaced to single.

parameters.name: prov
parameters.description: Province for the listing. This name must be SEO-normalized: accents removed, non-alphanumeric characters (including spaces) replaced with dashes, and multiple dashes replaced to single.

parameters.name: fmt
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Set the language for the response. Permitted values are en or fr

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: A string of characters which uniquely identifies a user of the application (such as their IP address, session ID, or phone ID)

get.summary: The GetTypeAhead method provides auto-completion a...
get.description: The GetTypeAhead method provides auto-completion as user types in their search term or location field. The suggestions returned are ranked by relevance (number of results and popularity).

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Characters typed by a user

parameters.name: field
parameters.description: Which field to provide suggestion: what (keyword) or where (location)

parameters.name: fmt
parameters.description: Output format as JSON or XML

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Set the language for the response. Permitted values are en or fr

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: A string of characters which uniquely identifies a user of the application (such as their IP address, session ID, or phone ID)
